maps.validate

Class GMLConnectivityValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.validate.GMLConnectivityValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapValidator<GMLMap>

    public class GMLConnectivityValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapValidator<GMLMap>
    Checks if a GML map is fully connected and if all individual shaped are correctly connected to each other (i.e. there are no dangling or no one-way connections).

        public java.util.Collection<ValidationError> validate(GMLMap mmap)
